alert.note: Alert for Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 3:12PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Big Horn County through 345 PM MDT... At 310 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lodge Grass, or 29 miles south of Hardin, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lodge Grass and Crow Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Motorists on I-90 should prepare for rapidly changing conditions. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
